conditions.name: Safety Review for Dose Titration
conditions.description: Safety Review Committee (SRC) must review safety data before dose titration.
conditions.text: Before titration to 30 mg/day, the Safety Review Committee (SRC) will review available safety data through Day 23 for each participant.

conditions.name: Outpatient Period Extension
conditions.description: The outpatient period can be extended with Investigator approval.
conditions.text: To ensure flexibility, the Outpatient Period during Treatment Period 1 may be extended up to an additional 14 days with Investigator approval.

conditions.name: ALT/AST Elevation - Moderate
conditions.description: ALT or AST is greater than 3 times and less than or equal to 5 times the upper limit of normal.

conditions.name: ALT/AST Elevation - High
conditions.description: ALT or AST is greater than 5 times and less than or equal to 8 times the upper limit of normal.

conditions.name: ALT/AST Elevation - Severe
conditions.description: ALT or AST is greater than 8 times the upper limit of normal.

conditions.name: Significant Hemoglobin Decrease
conditions.description: Hemoglobin decreases by more than 30% from baseline.

conditions.name: Significant Neutropenia
conditions.description: Neutrophils decrease by more than 30% from baseline and are below the reference range.
conditions.text: Neutrophils > 30% ↓ from baseline AND Neutrophils below reference range at baseline

conditions.name: Potential Liver Injury (Hy's Law)
conditions.description: Bilirubin is greater than 2 times ULN accompanied by ALT greater than 3 times ULN.
conditions.text: Bilirubin > 2 × ULN Accompanied by ALT > 3 × ULN, indicative of liver injury

conditions.name: Neurologic Worsening
conditions.description: Evidence of neurologic worsening by AEs or by neurologic physical exam assessment.
conditions.text: Evidence of neurologic worsening by AEs or by neurologic physical exam assessment

conditions.name: Psychiatric Worsening
conditions.description: Evidence of clinically significant acute psychiatric worsening.
conditions.text: Evidence of clinically significant acute psychiatric worsening which may include but not limited to suicidality, acute depression, or psychosis.

transitionRules.name: Dose Titration to 30mg
transitionRules.text: Following the Run-in Period, participants will be administered ALXN1840 at 15 mg/day for a treatment period of approximately 28 days followed by titration up to 30 mg/day on Day 29.

transitionRules.name: Dose Reduction for Moderate ALT/AST Elevation
transitionRules.text: If ALT or AST > 3 to ≤ 5 × ULN, reduce dose to previous dose level if up-titration has occurred or reduce dose to 15 mg QOD if on 15 mg QD. No further dose increase until resolution of abnormality.

transitionRules.name: Dose Interruption for High ALT/AST Elevation
transitionRules.text: If ALT or AST > 5 to ≤ 8 × ULN, temporarily interrupt dosing.

transitionRules.name: Discontinuation for Severe ALT/AST Elevation
transitionRules.text: If ALT or AST > 8 × ULN, permanently discontinue study intervention.

transitionRules.name: Dose Reduction for Hemoglobin Decrease
transitionRules.text: If Hemoglobin > 30% ↓ from baseline, reduce dose to previous dose level if up-titration has occurred or reduce dose to 15 mg QOD if on 15 mg QD.

transitionRules.name: Dose Reduction for Neutropenia
transitionRules.text: If Neutrophils > 30% ↓ from baseline and below reference range, reduce dose to previous dose level if up-titration has occurred or reduce dose to 15 mg QOD if on 15 mg QD.

transitionRules.name: Dose Interruption for Potential Liver Injury
transitionRules.text: If Bilirubin > 2 × ULN with ALT > 3 × ULN, temporarily interrupt dosing.

transitionRules.name: Dose Modification for Neurologic Worsening
transitionRules.text: Investigator and Alexion Medical Monitor will evaluate the need for dose modification (interruption, increase or decrease) based on copper control parameters and relevant clinical data.

transitionRules.name: Intervention Discontinuation for Hypersensitivity
transitionRules.text: Participants must be considered for discontinuation from study intervention if a serious hypersensitivity reaction occurs.

transitionRules.name: Intervention Discontinuation for Infection
transitionRules.text: Participants must be considered for discontinuation from study intervention if a severe uncontrolled infection occurs.

transitionRules.name: Intervention Discontinuation for Disallowed Medication
transitionRules.text: Participants must be considered for discontinuation from study intervention for use of disallowed medication.

transitionRules.name: Intervention Discontinuation for Pregnancy
transitionRules.text: Participants must be considered for discontinuation from study intervention for pregnancy or planned pregnancy.

scheduleTimelineExits.name: Study Completion
scheduleTimelineExits.description: A participant is considered to have completed the study if he/she has completed all phases of the study including the last scheduled procedure shown in the Schedule of Activities (SoA).

scheduleTimelineExits.name: Participant Withdrawal
scheduleTimelineExits.description: A participant may withdraw from the study at any time at his/her own request.

scheduleTimelineExits.name: Investigator Discretionary Withdrawal
scheduleTimelineExits.description: A participant may be withdrawn at any time at the discretion of the Investigator for safety, behavioral, compliance, or administrative reasons.

scheduleTimelineExits.name: Lost to Follow-up
scheduleTimelineExits.description: A participant will be considered lost to follow-up if he or she repeatedly fails to return for scheduled visits and is unable to be contacted by the study site.

scheduleTimelineExits.name: Sponsor Termination of Study
scheduleTimelineExits.description: Alexion reserves the right to close the study site or terminate the study at any time for any reason at the sole discretion of Alexion.

scheduledDecisionInstances.name: Dose Titration Decision
scheduledDecisionInstances.description: Decision point for titrating dose from 15mg to 30mg based on SRC review of safety data through Day 23.

scheduledDecisionInstances.name: Ongoing Dose Modification Decision
scheduledDecisionInstances.description: Ongoing decisions to reduce, interrupt, or discontinue study drug based on safety monitoring for liver function, hematology, and clinical worsening.
